Articles.Content:
Hello, I think it will be very good if you could add some sort of news centre. So for example, if you repeatedly fail contracts etc, you could have fake news reports about people not liking Kerbal Space Program etc as the reputation has taken a hit. With that you can have specific contracts too boost reputation to get the public back on your side.

Not sure how else I can describe it, similar things are in Sim City etc.
Like the Galactic News Network from Master of Orion 1 and 2.

I guess it could be fed into mission control. "You better land on this planet, Kerbin are starting to forget our program"

"News just in, Jeb has just landed on the Mun" - Reputation 100+
